metadata.name: Illuminated #1
metadata.description:
This series, ILLUMINATED, explores communication beyond the reach of written language. We find feeling—and meaning—in the bright wash of an epiphany, in the sound of a companion’s voice, or in the design of a book. Words alone can do so much, but some things lie in the space just beyond them.

The characters used in ILLUMINATED do not belong to any language and are created using a typographic generative algorithm created for the Art Blocks Curated collection ASEMICA in 2021.
